00002 
00003 include_once('CMSLOCResult.php');
00004 include_once('CMClass.php');
00005 
00013 class CMSLOC implements CMClass {
00014  
00018  public $result;
00019  
00023  private $classDepth = 0;
00024  
00028  public function CMSLOC() {
00029   $this->result = new CMSLOCResult();
00030  }
00031  
00041  public function processPath($path) {
00042   // if its a directory we process all of the items
00043   if(is_dir($path)) {
00044    if($handle = opendir($path)) {
00045        while(false !== ($file = readdir($handle))) {
00046         if(substr($file, 0, 1) != '.')
00047             $this->processPath("$path/$file");
00048        }
00049        closedir($handle);
00050    }
00051    return true;
00052   }
00053   
00054   // process a single file
00055   return $this->processFilePHP($path);
00056  }
00057  
00067  private function processFilePHP($path) {
00068   // get the contents of the file to process
00069   $contents = file_get_contents($path);
00070   
00071   // we only want the code thats in the <?php tags
00072   $start = strpos($contents, '<?php') + strlen('<?php');
00073   $end = strrpos($contents, '?>');
00074   $contents = substr($contents, $start, $end - $start);
00075   $len = strlen($contents);
00076   
00077   // increment the file count
00078   ++$this->result->files;
00079   
00080   // count the characters
00081   $this->result->characters += $len;
00082   
00083   // count the blank lines
00084   $line = "";
00085   for($i = 0; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00086    $c = substr($contents, $i, 1);
00087    
00088    if($c == "\n") {
00089     if(trim($line) == "")
00090      ++$this->result->blankLines;
00091     $line = "";
00092    } else $line .= $c;
00093   }
00094   
00095   // count the physicalLines
00096   for($i = 0; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00097    $c = substr($contents, $i, 1);
00098    if($c == "\n")
00099     ++$this->result->physicalLines;
00100   }
00101   ++$this->result->physicalLines;
00102   
00103   // strip out all the comments and strings
00104   $newContents = "";
00105   for($i = 0; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00106    $c = substr($contents, $i, 1);
00107    
00108    // single quotes
00109    if($c == "'") {
00110     ++$i;
00111     for(; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00112      $c = substr($contents, $i, 1);
00113      if($c == "'")
00114       break;
00115     }
00116    } else
00117    
00118    // double quotes
00119    if($c == "\"") {
00120     ++$i;
00121     for(; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00122      $c = substr($contents, $i, 1);
00123      if($c == "\"")
00124       break;
00125     }
00126    } else
00127    
00128    // multi line comment
00129    if(substr($contents, $i, 2) == '/*') {
00130     ++$this->result->commentLines;
00131     while(substr($contents, $i, 2) != '*/' && $i < $len) {
00132      if(substr($contents, $i, 1) == "\n")
00133       ++$this->result->commentLines;
00134      ++$i;
00135     }
00136     ++$i;
00137    } else
00138    
00139    // single line comment
00140    if(substr($contents, $i, 2) == '//') {
00141     ++$this->result->commentLines;
00142     $i = strpos($contents, "\n", $i);
00143     if($i === false)
00144      break;
00145    } else
00146    
00147    $newContents .= $c;
00148   }
00149   
00150   return $this->processBlockPHP('', $newContents);
00151  }
00152  
00162  private function processBlockPHP($iden, $b) {
00163   // process the keyword
00164   $keyword = "";
00165   $isStatic = false;
00166   $objectType = '';
00167   
00168   if(trim($iden) != "")
00169    ++$this->result->logicalLines;
00170   
00171   for($i = 0; $i < strlen($iden); ++$i) {
00172    $c = substr($iden, $i, 1);
00173    if($c == "(" || ctype_space($c)) {
00174     $keyword = trim($keyword);
00175     
00176     if($keyword == 'function') {
00177      $objectType = 'function';
00178      if($this->classDepth) {
00179       if($isStatic)
00180        ++$this->result->staticMethods;
00181       else ++$this->result->methods;
00182      } else ++$this->result->functions;
00183     } elseif($keyword == 'class') {
00184      ++$this->result->classes;
00185      ++$this->classDepth;
00186      $objectType = 'class';
00187     } elseif($keyword == 'interface') {
00188      ++$this->result->interfaces;
00189      ++$this->classDepth;
00190      $objectType = 'interface';
00191     } elseif($keyword == 'static') {
00192      $isStatic = true;
00193     } elseif($keyword == 'for') {
00194      $this->result->logicalLines += 2;
00195     }
00196     
00197     $keyword = "";
00198    } else $keyword .= $c;
00199   }
00200   
00201   $len = strlen($b);
00202   $cmd = "";
00203   $gb1 = 0; // ()
00204   $gb2 = 0; // []
00205   $gb3 = 0; // {}
00206   
00207   // process the block
00208   for($i = 0; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00209    $c = substr($b, $i, 1);
00210    
00211         if($c == '(') ++$gb1;
00212    else if($c == ')') --$gb1;
00213    else if($c == '[') ++$gb2;
00214    else if($c == ']') --$gb2;
00215    else if($c == '{') ++$gb3;
00216    else if($c == '}') --$gb3;
00217    
00218    // logical lines
00219    if($c == ";" && !$gb1 && !$gb2 && !$gb3) {
00220     // check for interface methods
00221     if($objectType == 'interface' && strpos($cmd, 'function') !== false)
00222      ++$this->result->interfaceMethods;
00223     
00224     if(strlen(trim($cmd)) != 0)
00225      ++$this->result->logicalLines;
00226     $cmd = "";
00227     continue;
00228    } else $cmd .= $c;
00229    
00230    // blocks
00231    if($c == "{") {
00232     $newblock = "";
00233     $b1 = 0; // ()
00234     $b2 = 0; // []
00235     $b3 = 0; // {}
00236     
00237     for(; $i < $len; ++$i) {
00238      $c = substr($b, $i, 1);
00239      
00240           if($c == '(') ++$b1;
00241      else if($c == ')') --$b1;
00242      else if($c == '[') ++$b2;
00243      else if($c == ']') --$b2;
00244      else if($c == '{') ++$b3;
00245      else if($c == '}') --$b3;
00246      
00247      if($c == '}' && !$b1 && !$b2 && !$b3) {
00248       $this->processBlockPHP($cmd, substr($newblock, 1, strlen($newblock) - 1));
00249       $cmd = "";
00250       break;
00251      }
00252      $newblock .= $c;
00253     }
00254     ++$i;
00255     continue;
00256    }
00257   }
00258   
00259   // decrement class depth
00260   if($objectType == 'class' || $objectType == 'interface')
00261    --$this->classDepth;
00262  
00263   // assume success
00264   return true;
00265  }
00266  
00270  public function __toString() {
00271   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00272  }
00273  
00274 }
